attributes.review:
Now that Trump is dead I don't see a reason to have this on the app store anymore. Yeah we're all upset and "grieving"ğŸ˜’ but it's time to get over it. Besides the fact that this app is completely pointless, as soon as i downloaded it bad things started to happen. Innocent black people across the country have been dying, and even more people were injured while peacefully protesting, and i have no other reason to believe this app isn't behind it. Not to MENTION my goldfish drowned this morningğŸ¥º. I am also very disappointed that this app fails to mention the rise in popularity of the manny flag. The first movie came out ten years ago, it was around longer than the whole confederacy which was only around for like four years. Manny is an important part of our history and we can NOT silence him. 
Black lives matter
LGBTQ+ rights 
Let women do what they want with their bodies
